item.title: Some Bugs in WSL2
item.author: notw
item.description: Cannot use ‘nvidia-smi’ command after login wsl via ssh fixed by add export PATH=/usr/lib/wsl/lib:$PATH to PATH. Cannot use ‘git clone’ reboot it. ssh connect error: kex_exchange_identification: read: Connection reset edit /etc/hosts.allow add sshd: ALL,restart sshd service.
